class.name: WatercraftBallast
class.brief_description: Allows off-center weight to be added to a [HydroRigidBody]
class.description: By default, the mass of a [HydroRigidBody] is centered at the origin of the object. Adding additional weight at various points can improve realism in some cases. The WatercraftBallast node allows you to position a point mass at a specific location. This can be useful for cases such as: - Creating a keel on a sailboat - Simulating cargo on a ship - Shifting the weight of a rider
